titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rush Rhees, [16. 5. 1950]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Ã–NB (Autogr. 1286/21-4); Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thank you for your 2 letters & the typewritten notes. I've read them through once & made remarks on the margin to some of them. I want to read them some more, make some more remarks & then send them to you. Not that what I write is much use but it might help to clear up some things.
